Title: Mining co-location relationships among bug reports to localize fault-prone modules
Published: IEICE TRANSACTIONS on Information and Systems,
Elements_risk_assessment: THe BIC could be not the BIC
UseOF-SZZ: to locate the origin of the bug
Summary: Study of co-location relationships among bug reports to improve the prediction accuracy of a state-of-the art learning method.
Outcome: The proposed scheme improve the prediction accuracy by nearly 11.6% on average
